name: targetvision
description: SmugMug-integrated RAG application for intelligent photo search

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app_simple:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 7050
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: TargetVision Team
